e0ebfd61-94cc-4b2b-9e92-98923ecd56f6.32e56012-0c5f-43e6-bea6-9c95795e4032.description=Generic flow to send an e-mail e0ebfd61-94cc-4b2b-9e92-98923ecd56f6.795580f9-7907-492e-a8c5-dbca1a7c1666.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API.

Inputs\:
_PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id
_processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State)



Result\:
_processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State

flow.name: pc_lc_add_disk

staticBinding.value: [{"server.csaname":"${server.csaname}"},{"flow.action":"Add Disk${disk.size}"},{"flow.error":"You reached the maximum disk size or number of disks on this server"},{"servicedesk.email":"${pc.email.servicedesk}"}]
